text.text: A third way to exlore the mod is traveling to past dimensions! Doing so is quite expensive, but is increably fun to see the prehistoric landscape!

Getting started with this side of the mod requires a bit of exploring. You must find Crystal Scarab Gem parts. They can be located in Black Market's loot and in Piglin Bastions treasure rooms. They are very rare. Then, in a Archaeology Table, you can make them into a Crystal Scarab gem.
